item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, January 22, 2025 at 3:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Ross Ulbricht granted a full pardon (447 points | 546 comments)
2. Stargate Project: SoftBank, OpenAI, Oracle, MGX to build data centers (446 points | 503 comments)
3. What are these bumps on the top of a pull-tab can? (13 points | discuss)
4. 0-click deanonymization attack targeting Signal, Discord, other platforms (1055 points | 358 comments)
5. Hunyuan3D 2.0 – High-Resolution 3D Assets Generation (118 points | 50 comments)
6. Isolating complexity is the essence of successful abstractions (22 points | 3 comments)
7. Invisible Electrostatic Wall at 3M plant (1996) (295 points | 155 comments)
8. Moving on from React, a year later (26 points | 3 comments)
9. Why is zero plural? (23 points | 25 comments)
10. Open-source browser port of Pitfall from the Atari 2600 (25 points | 4 comments)
11. Castle Game Engine: Web target – big progress, first 3 demos to try (50 points | 8 comments)
12. Ask HN: Songwriters, what software do you use? (22 points | 23 comments)
13. Calm tech certification "rewards" less distracting tech (214 points | 60 comments)
14. Evo: Version control that works the way you think (9 points | 7 comments)
15. The Peppermills of Jens Quistgaard (56 points | 33 comments)
16. Ask HN: Is anyone doing anything cool with tiny language models? (277 points | 128 comments)
17. Mercator: Extreme (128 points | 25 comments)
18. JReleaser: quick and effortless way to release your project (58 points | 16 comments)
19. HyperDX (YC S22) is hiring engineers to build open source observability ( | hide)
20. Rafael Araujo's 20 Mesmerizing Geometrical Masterpieces (2024) (90 points | 11 comments)
21. Dissecting "Tiny Clouds" shadertoy (2017) (15 points | discuss)
22. Sigstore: Making sure your software is what it claims to be (53 points | 18 comments)
23. Prime numbers so memorable that people hunt for them (111 points | 66 comments)
24. Liskov Substitution: The real meaning of inheritance (29 points | 19 comments)
25. Show HN: I made a app that uses NFC as a physical switch to block distractions (147 points | 90 comments)
26. Concept cells help your brain abstract information and build memories (87 points | 7 comments)
27. More than 40% of postdocs leave academia, study reveals (151 points | 178 comments)
28. Guided by the beauty of our test suite (85 points | 7 comments)
29. Unconventional Adventures (31 points | 8 comments)
30. Show HN: Printercow – Turn any thermal printer into an API endpoint (116 points | 89 comments)
